job.title: .Net Developer
job.description:
Must-haves
5+ years of experience with C# .net development
Experience working with and supporting bot MongoDB and SQL databases
Experience with Angular or bootstrap on the front end
Experience with small enhancements
Experience with application support by reading through stack traces and debug logs to identify code or data problems and remediating these issues
Plusses
Experience building and consuming rest APIs
Working knowledge with Azure
SiteCore experience
Salesforce administration of Development experience
Day-to-Day
Insight Global is looking for a Senior .NET Software Engineer that will be responsible for supporting custom applications, integrations, and an enterprise CMS system. They will design, build, and deploy code solutions to web applications and supporting services based on requests and incidents provided by stakeholders and IT leadership. As well as maintain databases, reports, and dashboards within supported systems. They are responsible for monitoring the application for errors, and system batch jobs for issues, proposing and implementing solutions where possible. They will collaborate with stakeholders to collect additional requirements for enhancements and bugfixes and support IT and stakeholders with incident resolution.
